gold.user: User wants to update the details of an existing incoming phone number, changing the friendly name and voice URL.
gold.ideal: Successfully updates the incoming phone number with the new details.

gold.user: User needs to retrieve the details of a specific incoming phone number to verify its configuration.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified incoming phone number.

gold.user: User wants to delete an incoming phone number that is no longer needed for their application.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the specified incoming phone number.

gold.user: User wants to list all incoming phone numbers associated with their account to manage them effectively.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of all incoming phone numbers for the account.

gold.user: User wants to create a new incoming phone number with specific settings for their application.
gold.ideal: Successfully creates a new incoming phone number and returns its details.
